channel.title: CVE Feed for Checkmk GmbH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Checkmk GmbH -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22348|2023-05-17T15:51:54.376Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper Authorization in RestAPI in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmk versions <2.1.0p28 and <2.2.0b8 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary host_configs.

item.title: CVE-2023-23548|2023-08-01T09:42:58.428Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Reflected XSS in business intelligence in Checkmk <2.2.0p8, <2.1.0p32, <2.0.0p38, <=1.6.0p30.

item.title: CVE-2023-23549|2023-11-15T11:07:28.671Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper Input Validation in Checkmk <2.2.0p15, <2.1.0p37, <=2.0.0p39 allows priviledged attackers to cause partial denial of service of the UI via too long hostnames.

item.title: CVE-2023-31208|2023-05-17T08:24:59.173Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in the RestAPI in Checkmk < 2.0.0p36, < 2.1.0p28, and < 2.2.0b8 (beta) allows arbitrary livestatus command execution for authorized users.

item.title: CVE-2023-31209|2023-08-10T08:14:12.067Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of active check command arguments in Checkmk < 2.1.0p32, < 2.0.0p38, < 2.2.0p4 leads to arbitrary command execution for authenticated users.

item.title: CVE-2023-31210|2023-12-13T08:26:46.452Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Usage of user controlled LD_LIBRARY_PATH in agent in Checkmk 2.2.0p10 up to 2.2.0p16 allows malicious Checkmk site user to escalate rights via injection of malicious libraries

item.title: CVE-2023-31211|2024-05-03T08:09:34.528Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Insufficient authentication flow in Checkmk before 2.2.0p18, 2.1.0p38 and 2.0.0p39 allows attacker to use locked credentials

item.title: CVE-2023-6735|2024-01-12T14:05:02.598Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Privilege escalation in mk_tsm agent plugin in Checkmk before 2.2.0p18, 2.1.0p38 and 2.0.0p39 allows local user to escalate privileges

item.title: CVE-2023-6251|2023-11-24T08:16:23.663Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Checkmk < 2.2.0p15, < 2.1.0p37, <= 2.0.0p39 allow an authenticated attacker to delete user-messages for individual users.

item.title: CVE-2023-6156|2023-11-22T16:24:15.515Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in the availability timeline in Checkmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p37, and < 2.2.0p15 allows arbitrary livestatus command execution for authorized users.

item.title: CVE-2023-6157|2023-11-22T16:24:22.002Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in ajax_search in Checkmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p37, and < 2.2.0p15 allows arbitrary livestatus command execution for authorized users.

item.title: CVE-2023-6287|2023-11-27T14:04:01.568Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk%20appliance
item.description: Sensitive data exposure in Webconf in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.8 allows local attacker to retrieve passwords via reading log files.

item.title: CVE-2023-6740|2024-01-12T14:04:33.614Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Privilege escalation in jar_signature agent plugin in Checkmk before 2.2.0p18, 2.1.0p38 and 2.0.0p39 allows local user to escalate privileges

item.title: CVE-2024-28833|2024-06-10T18:12:59.037Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts with two factor authentication methods in Checkmk 2.3 before 2.3.0p6 facilitates brute-forcing of second factor mechanisms.

item.title: CVE-2024-28825|2024-06-04T18:03:50.090Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts on some authentication methods in Checkmk before 2.3.0b5 (beta), 2.2.0p26, 2.1.0p43, and in Checkmk 2.0.0 (EOL) facilitates password brute-forcing.

item.title: CVE-2024-28824|2024-03-22T10:26:35.280Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Least privilege violation and reliance on untrusted inputs in the mk_informix Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28826|2024-06-05T20:33:54.922Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Improper restriction of local upload and download paths in check_sftp in Checkmk before 2.3.0p4, 2.2.0p27, 2.1.0p44, and in Checkmk 2.0.0 (EOL) allows attackers with sufficient permissions to configure the check to read and write local files on the Checkmk site server.

item.title: CVE-2024-1742|2024-03-22T10:26:06.238Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Invocation of the sqlplus command with sensitive information in the command line in the mk_oracle Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows the extraction of this information from the process list.

item.title: CVE-2024-0638|2024-03-22T10:25:35.675Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Least privilege violation in the Checkmk agent plugins mk_oracle, mk_oracle.ps1, and mk_oracle_crs before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-0670|2024-03-11T14:50:59.415Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Privilege escalation in windows agent plugin in Checkmk before 2.2.0p23, 2.1.0p40 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local user to escalate privileges

item.title: CVE-2024-3367|2024-06-04T17:32:48.744Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Argument injection in websphere_mq agent plugin in Checkmk 2.0.0, 2.1.0, <2.2.0p26 and <2.3.0b5 allows local attacker to inject one argument to runmqsc

item.title: CVE-2024-2380|2024-04-05T13:01:08.382Z -- checkmk%20gmbh -- checkmk
item.description: Stored XSS in graph rendering in Checkmk <2.3.0b4.
